DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to assess the comfort of OPTI-FREE RepleniSH in soft contact lens wearers.
DOC.brief_title: Subjective Comfort With Multipurpose Care Solutions in Soft Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.criteria: Currently wearing silicone hydrogel contact lenses on a daily wear basis; Currently using OPTIFREE RepleniSH contact lens solution; Generally healthy; Normal ocular health; Willing to follow study procedures and visit schedule; Sign Informed Consent and privacy document; Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Use of additional lens cleaners; Known sensitivities to any ingredient in either test article; Systemic or ocular disease or disorder that would negatively affect the conduct or outcome of the study; History of ocular surgery/trauma within the last 6 months; Any topical ocular or systemic antibiotics within 7 days of enrollment continuing throughout the study; Participation in any other ophthalmic drug or device clinical trial within 30 days of enrollent; Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
